column4: gosh, ubuntu is taking forever to install on my spare celeron 333mhz box
how do i ssh into my ubuntu box? ssh -l user@xxx.xxx.xx.xx ??
and I typed that as quickly as I could
yes, RDP is the Microsoft protocol
System | Preferences | Remote Desktop on the machine you want to log in to
I have that setup already. I need to know what to do from my side
it tells you command in that dialog box
I understand that.  I just learned that optical mice jump on repeated patterns. Like the faux woodgrain on my desk
one of the women in work still doesn't believe me, she thinks it was a setup, that I programmed her computer to make the mouse jump
tell her to have a drink and shutup
Tell her you programmed her mouse to click into her bank account when she is not there
nah, that would be dangerous, she gets any problems with her bank account I guarantee she'd have the police knocking on my door
you work on *nix boxes at work or windows?
I'm trying to irradicate our dependence on M$
